description: Demolition of existing sheds and the construction of a single storey outbuilding
borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied or
used at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of
the dwelling known as 83 Lullington Road and as shown on the plans hereby
approved.  



Reason: To protect the character and appearance of the
surrounding area, to safeguard the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers
and to ensure that the building is not used as self-contained accommodation,
which may give rise to substandard living conditions.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

  • Site Location Plan (dated: 03/04/2024)
  • Proposed Block Plan (drawing no: 2, received: 29/09/2024)
  • Proposed Site Plan (drawing no: 3, received: 29/09/2024)
  • Proposed 3D views (drawing no: 12, received: 29/09/2024)
  • Proposed Rear 3D views (drawing no: 10, received: 29/09/2024)
  • Proposed Floor and Roof Plans (drawing no: 15, received: 29/09/2024)
  • Proposed Elevations (drawing no: 16, received: 29/09/2024)
  • Proposed Sections (drawing no: 17, received: 29/09/2024)
  • Proposed North and South Elevations (drawing no: 13, received: 29/09/2024)
  • Proposed 3D Front Elevation (drawing no: 14, received: 29/09/2024)

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
